definition[0]: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion
example[1]: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
example[2]: The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
definition[1]: something that you do regularly and in the same way each time
example[4]: He went through the ritual of lighting his cigar.
definition[2]: done as part of a rite or ritual
definition[3]: done in a fixed and expected way, but without real meaning or sincerity
example[6]: The police issued the usual ritual apology.
